version.description: Select or enter an anaconda version.

features.name: AWS CLI
features.description: Installs the AWS CLI along with needed dependencies. Useful for base Dockerfiles that often are missing required install dependencies like gpg.

version.description: Select or enter an AWS CLI version.

features.name: Azure CLI
features.description: Installs the Azure CLI along with needed dependencies. Useful for base Dockerfiles that often are missing required install dependencies like gpg.

version.description: Select or enter an Azure CLI version. (Available versions may vary by Linux distribution.)

extensions.description: Optional comma separated list of Azure CLI extensions to install in profile.

features.name: Common Utilities
features.description: Installs a set of common command line utilities, Oh My Zsh!, and sets up a non-root user.

username.description: Enter name of a non-root user to configure or none to skip

nonFreePackages.description: Add packages from non-free Debian repository? (Debian only)

features.name: Conda
features.description: A cross-platform, language-agnostic binary package manager

version.description: Select or enter a conda version.

addCondaForge.description: Add conda-forge channel to the config?

features.name: Light-weight Desktop
features.description: Adds a lightweight Fluxbox based desktop to the container that can be accessed using a VNC viewer or the web. GUI-based commands executed from the built-in VS code terminal will open on the desktop automatically.

version.description: Currently Unused!

password.description: Enter a password for desktop connections

webPort.description: Enter a port for the VNC web client

vncPort.description: Enter a port for the desktop VNC server

features.name: Docker (Docker-in-Docker)
features.description: Create child containers *inside* a container, independent from the host's docker instance. Installs Docker extension in the container along with needed CLIs.

version.description: Select or enter a Docker/Moby Engine version. (Availability can vary by OS version.)

moby.description: Install OSS Moby build instead of Docker CE

dockerDashComposeVersion.description: Default version of Docker Compose (v1 or v2)

azureDnsAutoDetection.description: Allow automatically setting the dockerd DNS server when the installation script detects it is running in Azure

dockerDefaultAddressPool.description: Define default address pools for Docker networks. e.g. base=192.168.0.0/16,size=24

features.name: Docker (docker-outside-of-docker)
features.description: Re-use the host docker socket, adding the Docker CLI to a container. Feature invokes a script to enable using a forwarded Docker socket within a container to run Docker commands.

version.description: Select or enter a Docker/Moby CLI version. (Availability can vary by OS version.)

moby.description: Install OSS Moby build instead of Docker CE

dockerDashComposeVersion.description: Compose version to use for docker-compose (v1 or v2)

features.name: Dotnet CLI
features.description: Installs the .NET CLI. Provides option of installing sdk or runtime, and option of versions to install. Uses latest version of .NET sdk as defaults to install.

version.description: Select or enter a dotnet CLI version. (Available versions may vary by Linux distribution.)

runtimeOnly.description: Install just the dotnet runtime if true, and sdk if false.

installUsingApt.description: If true, it installs using apt instead of the release URL

features.name: Git (from source)
features.description: Install an up-to-date version of Git, built from source as needed. Useful for when you want the latest and greatest features. Auto-detects latest stable version and installs needed dependencies.

version.description: Select or enter a Git version.

features.name: Git Large File Support (LFS)
features.description: Installs Git Large File Support (Git LFS) along with needed dependencies. Useful for base Dockerfiles that often are missing required install dependencies like git and curl.

version.description: Select version of Git LFS to install

features.name: GitHub CLI
features.description: Installs the GitHub CLI. Auto-detects latest version and installs needed dependencies.

version.description: Select version of the GitHub CLI, if not latest.

features.name: Go
features.description: Installs Go and common Go utilities. Auto-detects latest version and installs needed dependencies.

version.description: Select or enter a Go version to install
Select or enter a version.

extended.description: Install Hugo extended for SASS/SCSS changes

features.description: Installs the Nix package manager and optionally a set of packages.

version.description: Version of Nix to install.

multiUser.description: Perform a multi-user install (instead of single user)

packages.description: Optional comma separated list of Nix packages to install in profile.

flakeUri.description: Optional URI to a Nix Flake to install in profile.

extraNixConfig.description: Optional comma separated list of extra lines to add to /etc/nix/nix.conf.

modules.description: Optional comma separated list of PowerShell modules to install.

features.name: Python
features.description: Installs the provided version of Python, as well as PIPX, and other common Python utilities.  JupyterLab is conditionally installed with the python feature. Note: May require source code compilation.

version.description: Select a Python version to install.

installTools.description: Install common Python tools like pylint

optimize.description: Optimize Python for performance when compiled (slow)

installPath.description: The path where python will be installed.

installJupyterlab.description: Install JupyterLab, a web-based interactive development environment for notebooks

configureJupyterlabAllowOrigin.description: Configure JupyterLab to accept HTTP requests from the specified origin

installTerraformDocs.description: Install terraform-docs, a utility to generate documentation from Terraform modules
